creature.title: Nightmare
creature.rules-text:
Flying
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

creature.title: Blitz Hellion
creature.rules-text:
Trample, haste

creature.flavor-text: Alarans commemorated its appearances with new holidays bearing names like the Great Cataclysm and the Fall of Ilson Gate.

creature.title: Barney of the Green Woods
creature.rules-text:
Indestructable, hexproof
{1}{U}{G}, {T}: Every opponent dies in a fire unless all pay {X}{U}{B}{G} or {X}{R}{B}{W} or {X}{X}{B} where X equals your life total.
creature.flavor-text: For the first time in his life, Barney felt warm. And hungry.

land.title: Elysian Brothel
land.rules-text:
All Sirens you control get +1/+1.
All Gods, Angels, and legendary creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
land.flavor-text: They are selective in their clientele, but their service legendary.

creature.title: Sleeping Cherub
creature.flavor-text: Serra's children are angels. And fierce.

spell.title: The Green Woods
spell.rules-text: Untap all Forests. All Forests become 1/4 green Elemental creatures with reach until end of turn. They are still lands.

spell.title: Purphoros' Axe
spell.rules-text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, pay {R} or sacrifice Purphoros' Axe.
At the end of your upkeep, choose target creature. The creature has protection from Forests until your next upkeep.
